article_quote: “The pandemic demonstrated the essential role of women in the health system.”
article_para1: Worldwide, women led caregiving, prevention, and response efforts during the COVID-19 crisis.
article_para2: Representing over 70% of healthcare workers, they supported communities in the most challenging times.
article_para3: The pandemic also highlighted the need to protect their mental health and physical well-being.
ref1_info: United Nations. (March 8, 2020). Women in health during COVID-19.
